name: shatter
content:

Add to word list
[ I or T ] to (cause something to) break suddenly into very small pieces: The glass shattered into a thousand tiny pieces. His leg was shattered in the accident.

[ T ] to end or severely damage something: The book shattered all her illusions about the Romans. Noisy motorbikes shattered the peace/calm/stillness.
